SELECT nt.id, nt.title, nt.content, ri.url , nt.create_time AS releaseTime, IF(nt.initiator_type='${stuType}',stu.real_name , tch.real_name) AS publisher FROM event_todo_notice AS nt
INNER JOIN event_todo_notice_permission AS ntp ON ntp.notice_id = nt.id AND ntp.mark=1
INNER JOIN permission_node AS pn ON pn.id=ntp.permission_id
INNER JOIN event_todo_notice_img AS img ON img.notice_id = nt.id AND img.mark=1
INNER JOIN resource_img ri ON img.uuid = ri.uuid
LEFT JOIN user_student AS stu ON nt.initiator_type = '${stuType}' AND stu.stu_number = nt.initiator_number
LEFT JOIN user_teacher AS tch ON nt.initiator_type = '${tchType}' AND tch.tch_number = nt.initiator_number
nt.mark=1
AND (pn.level1='${node.getLevel1()}' OR pn.level1='*')
AND (pn.level2='${node.getLevel2()}' OR pn.level2='*')
AND (pn.level3 like '${node.getLevel3()}' OR pn.level3='*')
AND (pn.level4='${node.getLevel4()}' OR pn.level4='*')
ORDER BY nt.create_time DESC;
